titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Carol Green Wilson Papers, ca. 1949-1975
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 2000 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, writings, clippings, and other printed matter, relating primarily to the life of Herbert Hoover. Includes material used as research for the book by C. G. Wilson, entitled Herbert Hoover : A Challenge for Today.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Carol Green Wilson Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1970.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Author, Arthur Fielder: Music for the Millions
Author, Herbert Hoover: A Challenge for Today

scopecontent.p: Relevant correspondence, notes, drafts, and reviews of books written by Carol Green Wilson, arranged alphabetically by title.
Correspondence of Carol Green Wilson, arranged alphabetically by correspondent.
Clippings, printed matter, articles and correspondence by others collected by Carol Green Wilson, arranged alphabetically by subject.

did.unittitle: Review by Alice Mary Greer, April, 1966.

unittitle.title: Arthur Fielder: Music for the Millions
Herbert Hoover: A Challenge for Today

did.unittitle: Notes. All notes are undated and holographs, unless otherwise indicated.

Hoover Commission on the Reorganization of the Executive Branch of the Government.
Jean Kellogg's Description of Herbert Hoover's Funeral in West Branch, Iowa.
Lochner, Louis, Herbert Hoover and Germany.
Page, Walter H., The Life and Letters of Walter H. Page.
Stanford - Food Research Institute, Business School, Hoover Library.
Warren, Harris G., Herbert Hoover and the Great Depression.
William Allen White Correspondence, 1933-1936 Regarding New Deal.
How Bert Hoover Met Lou Henry, 1965.
American Institute of Mining, Metallurgical and Petroleum Engineers

W. W. Norton and Co., Inc.
La Belgique et l'Entree en Guerre des Etats-Unis (Belgium and the Entry of the United States in the War)
Davis, J. S., The Food Research Institute, 1921-1941: An Interpretation.

did.physdesc: Letters and notes, originals and photocopies

did.unittitle: Foote, Arthur B., Men and Mines.
